mapper.insert: insert into mwvisitor(visit_no, visit_ip, visit_time, visit_refer, visit_agent, id) values(mwvisitor_seq.nextval, #{visit_ip}, sysdate, #{visit_refer}, #{visit_agent}, #{id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from mwvisitor where visit_time >= #{day2} and visit_time < #{day1}
select count(*) from mw_deletemember where reg >= #{day2} and reg < #{day1}
select count(*) from mwmember where reg >= #{day2} and reg < #{day1}
select count(*) from mwmoneyio where io_reg_date >= #{day2} and io_reg_date < #{day1}
select * from (select faq_num, subject, id, reg, rownum from mwfaqboard order by reg desc, faq_num desc) where rownum <=5

select sense_detail_category, count(sense_category) count from (select * from mwsense_category c left outer join mwscrap s on c.sense_detail_category = s.sense_category) group by sense_detail_category order by sense_detail_category

select age, count(age) as count from (select case when trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) >=20 and trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) <30 then 20 when trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) >=30 and trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) <40 then 30 when trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) >=40 and trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) <50 then 40 else 0 end as age from mwmember) group by age order by age
